response.answer_text: Hey! You’re very close to becoming a fluent speaker in Chinese solely because you’ve taken the initiative to improve! You Can Improve your Chinese language skills by: Getting regular classes with a native speaking tutor on the internet I know of someone who was able to get a free trial lesson in Chinese language with a native speaking tutor on the internet. You should try it out to see how that teaching style works for you.  Also, you should know that: Taking classes online in China may have seen like a challenge a decade or so ago, but with innovate ways of lessons such as interactive video chats, fun exercises, and social media, there are plenty of resources that you can use to improve your Chinese! As just mentioned, internet tutors available on the internet to help you improve your Chinese are the best ways to improve your language skills because: Tutors provide interactive video chatsTutors provide fun exercisesSocial media pop quizzes can be used for teaching One way you can improve your Chinese with native speaking tutor is by: Video chats with tutors For starters, with video chats you can: Improve your Chinese as if you are in a classroom in real time. Video chat allows you to effectively hear and see the tutor that is teaching you, so much so that you can fully grasp the way the tutor ways words and phrases in Chinese. One major advantage of this is that you’ll be able to restate the words and phrases back, to get feedback on whether or not you have the tones and words understood. Yes, tones. As you might already know, Chinese language is unique among many languages because: The use of tones make each word have a very specific way of oral recitation. A tutor who hones in on the tonal differences of Mandarin on a daily basis, is the very thing that will allow your language learning experience to be so much more valuable, so much that it’s as if you have studied in China.  Therefore, you may know by now that: Your ability to get instant responses to your specific needs and challenges that you face while speaking, reading, and writing, are a tremendously important aspect of eventually mastering the Chinese language. Video chat based lessons in Mandarin have several aspects to them, such as the initial introduction between you and your tutor (just to become familiar with each other, so that the learning environment is as comfortable as possible), then there will likely be a lesson, which is where the tutor might be able to evaluate your current level by asking questions, and gauging your responses, as well as your ability to accurately respond in Chinese using the correct tones, and sentence structures. All these aspects of video chat make its a viable way to learn, and improve your Mandarin, much more than many other ways of learning the Chinese language. Another way you can improve your Chinese with a native speaking tutor is by: Fun Exercises provided by tutors With fun exercises you can: Get interactive help to answers that you might not get correct on exercises questions the tutor provides for you. Aside from the usual conversation based exercises tutors like to do with students, you can also take HSK based exercises on video, such as the tutor showing you how to write characters or recognize, and read characters. The HSK, in case you weren’t aware, is a Chinese proficiency exam that’s given by an official educational body in China, and is highly recognized by Chinese universities, and many companies all around the word. The HSK Chinese exam scores are very useful for you because: The test helps schools and potential employers identify which applicants are skilled in Chinese. Native speaking tutors can give you exercises that are based on material from the HSK, which significantly improve your chances of scoring highly on the exam, so that you can be at the tip-top of the list of accepted students and or employees.  Another way you can improve your Chinese with native speaking tutor is by: Social media pop quizzes provide by tutors With social media pop quizzes you can: Get on-the-fly quizzes that will test you on random aspects of Chinese language, such as synonyms, measure words, and even sentence structures. The regular administration of such quizzes will allow you to improve your Chinese language skill. Native speaking tutors will be able to analyze the answer to the quiz with you, allowing you to quickly grasp the information effectively.  Therefore, you should really understand that: Social media is also a great way to connect with other students, and even speak Chinese with each other. Using the free trial suggestion mentioned above, you definitely can get access to so many more resources and exclusive groups, once you sign up for the trial! Native speaking tutors who have been professionally trained to help students learn Chinese, are very keen on social interaction as a tool to improve in the language. With regular, friendly, and conversational based interaction, not only will you become a better speaker who recognizes pinyin and it’s association with characters, but you’ll also learn how to causally speak Mandarin, such as using slang, which is something not necessarily taught in traditional schools. In conclusion, You can improve your Chinese language skills significantly by signing up for internet classes with a native speaking tutor. You can actually get a free trial lesson, as I mentioned above. With regular exercises with a native speaking tutor, you can improve your speech by video chats, get fun exercises, and even do pop quizzes over social media! Thus multiplatform approach is a convenient way for you to learn Chinese from wherever you are, and on your own time with a tutor who is professional. Improving Chinese takes time, so be patient with it, and you will be a fluent speaker sooner than you would know!
